		/* Max-width for images in IE6 */		
		var centerwidth = jQuery("td#middle").width();

			var maxwidth = centerwidth - 10 + 'px';
			var imgwidth = jQuery(this).width(); 
			var imgheight = jQuery(this).height(); 
			var newimgheight = (centerwidth / imgwidth * imgheight) + 'px';	
			if (imgwidth > centerwidth) { 
				jQuery(this).css({width: maxwidth}); 
				jQuery(this).css({height: newimgheight}); 
			}
		});
		
		/* Images with caption */
		jQuery("div.wp-caption").each(function() { 
			var captionwidth = jQuery(this).width(); 
			var maxcaptionwidth = centerwidth + 'px';
			var captionheight = jQuery(this).height();
			var captionimgwidth =  jQuery("div.wp-caption img").width();
			var captionimgheight =  jQuery("div.wp-caption img").height();
			if (captionwidth > centerwidth) { 
				jQuery(this).css({width: maxcaptionwidth}); 
				var newcaptionheight = (centerwidth / captionwidth * captionheight) + 'px';
				var newcaptionimgheight = (centerwidth / captionimgwidth * captionimgheight) + 'px';
				jQuery(this).css({height: newcaptionheight}); 
				jQuery("div.wp-caption img").css({height: newcaptionimgheight}); 
				}
		});

	/* Since 3.7.8: Auto resize videos (embed and iframe elements)

	*/
	function bfa_resize_video() {
		jQuery('embed, iframe').each( function() {
			var video = jQuery(this),
			videoWidth = video.attr('width'); // use the attr here, not width() or css()
			videoParent = video.parent(),
			videoParentWidth = parseFloat( videoParent.css( 'width' ) ),
			videoParentBorder = parseFloat( videoParent.css( 'border-left-width' ) ) 
										+  parseFloat( videoParent.css( 'border-right-width' ) ),
			videoParentPadding = parseFloat( videoParent.css( 'padding-left' ) ) 
										+  parseFloat( videoParent.css( 'padding-right' ) ),
			maxWidth = videoParentWidth - videoParentBorder - videoParentPadding;

			if( videoWidth > maxWidth ) {
				var videoHeight = video.attr('height'),
				videoMaxHeight = ( maxWidth / videoWidth * videoHeight );
				video.attr({ width: maxWidth, height: videoMaxHeight });
			} 

		});	
	}

								<div class="post-2392 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-diary odd" id="post-2392">
						<div class="post-headline"><h2>				<a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2014/12/01/%e6%96%b0%e7%ab%b9%e5%b8%82%e9%95%b7%e9%81%b8%e8%88%89%e7%b5%90%e6%9e%9c/" rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to 新竹市長選舉結果">
				新竹市長選舉結果</a></h2></div>				<div class="post-bodycopy clearfix"><p>林智堅議員的 76578 票 (38.36%) 以 1014 票的差距險勝阿財市長的 75564 票 (37.85%)，所以新竹市也變天了。<br />
但是議員的結構和過去其實沒有差距很大，高喊議會資訊透明化的幾位年輕議員們也全軍覆沒，議會是否能發揮監督市府的功能依然極度令人缺乏信心。<br />
前市長蔡仁堅票數是 40480 (20.28%)，以他被柯建銘惡整搞到被開除黨籍參選還能有這票數來說，確實很不容易。<br />
選民結構統計資訊就等相關單位弄出來吧，這邊不討論。</p>
<p> <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2014/12/01/%e6%96%b0%e7%ab%b9%e5%b8%82%e9%95%b7%e9%81%b8%e8%88%89%e7%b5%90%e6%9e%9c/#more-2392" class="more-link">Continue reading 新竹市長選舉結果 »</a></p>
</div>						<div class="post-footer"><img src="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/wp-content/themes/atahualpa/images/icons/comment-gray.gif" alt="" /> <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2014/12/01/%e6%96%b0%e7%ab%b9%e5%b8%82%e9%95%b7%e9%81%b8%e8%88%89%e7%b5%90%e6%9e%9c/#respond" class="comments-link" ><span class="dsq-postid" data-dsqidentifier="2392 http://blog.tinlans.org/?p=2392">Leave a comment</span></a>   <img src="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/wp-content/themes/atahualpa/images/icons/folder-gray.gif" alt="" /> <a class="diary" href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/category/diary/" title="diary">diary</a>    | 2014-12-01 04:15:35</div>		</div><!-- / Post -->	
						
		
								<div class="post-2376 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-diary even" id="post-2376">
						<div class="post-headline"><h2>				<a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2014/11/28/%e5%86%8d%e8%ab%87%e6%96%b0%e7%ab%b9%e5%b8%82%e9%95%b7%e9%81%b8%e8%88%89/" rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to 再談新竹市長選舉">
				再談新竹市長選舉</a></h2></div>				<div class="post-bodycopy clearfix"><p>第二次公辦的政見電視發表會也看過了，在這期間也多瞭解了一下幾位候選人的資料。<br />
先說結論，我的結論還是和之前一樣，票會投給蔡仁堅。<br />
投他不是因為對他非常滿意，而是五位候選人中非要選一個的話，我認為投給他會是比較適當的。</p>
<p> <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2014/11/28/%e5%86%8d%e8%ab%87%e6%96%b0%e7%ab%b9%e5%b8%82%e9%95%b7%e9%81%b8%e8%88%89/#more-2376" class="more-link">Continue reading 再談新竹市長選舉 »</a></p>
</div>						<div class="post-footer"><img src="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/wp-content/themes/atahualpa/images/icons/comment-gray.gif" alt="" /> <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2014/11/28/%e5%86%8d%e8%ab%87%e6%96%b0%e7%ab%b9%e5%b8%82%e9%95%b7%e9%81%b8%e8%88%89/#respond" class="comments-link" ><span class="dsq-postid" data-dsqidentifier="2376 http://blog.tinlans.org/?p=2376">Leave a comment</span></a>   <img src="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/wp-content/themes/atahualpa/images/icons/folder-gray.gif" alt="" /> <a class="diary" href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/category/diary/" title="diary">diary</a>    | 2014-11-28 22:59:18</div>		</div><!-- / Post -->	
						
		
								<div class="post-2357 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-diary odd" id="post-2357">
						<div class="post-headline"><h2>				<a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2014/11/21/%e6%96%b0%e7%ab%b9%e5%b8%82%e5%b8%82%e9%95%b7%e5%8f%8a%e5%b8%82%e8%ad%b0%e5%93%a1%e9%81%b8%e8%88%89/" rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to 新竹市市長及市議員選舉">
				新竹市市長及市議員選舉</a></h2></div>				<div class="post-bodycopy clearfix"><p>市長的部分基本上阿財應該是穩上，市議員也都是特定份子穩上，所以年輕人應該連投都懶得投。<br />
不過這幾年看車輪黨實在越來越不順眼，加上我真的不知道這阿財在新竹究竟搞什麼飛機，所以今年我決定去投票。<br />
畢竟不投票，就只是看不順眼的那方少了一票；但是投給別人，就是看不順眼的那方不但少了一票，他們的對手還多了一票。<br />
就算制裁效果極小，就算一票能改變的數字只有 1，但能產生數字變化就有發洩效果，所以還是投吧。<br />
附上選舉公報連結：<a href="http://web.cec.gov.tw/files/11-1000-5373.php" target=_blank>103 年地方公職人員選舉公報</a></p>
<p> <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2014/11/21/%e6%96%b0%e7%ab%b9%e5%b8%82%e5%b8%82%e9%95%b7%e5%8f%8a%e5%b8%82%e8%ad%b0%e5%93%a1%e9%81%b8%e8%88%89/#more-2357" class="more-link">Continue reading 新竹市市長及市議員選舉 »</a></p>
</div>						<div class="post-footer"><img src="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/wp-content/themes/atahualpa/images/icons/comment-gray.gif" alt="" /> <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2014/11/21/%e6%96%b0%e7%ab%b9%e5%b8%82%e5%b8%82%e9%95%b7%e5%8f%8a%e5%b8%82%e8%ad%b0%e5%93%a1%e9%81%b8%e8%88%89/#comments" class="comments-link" ><span class="dsq-postid" data-dsqidentifier="2357 http://blog.tinlans.org/?p=2357">1 comment</span></a>   <img src="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/wp-content/themes/atahualpa/images/icons/folder-gray.gif" alt="" /> <a class="diary" href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/category/diary/" title="diary">diary</a>    | 2014-11-21 23:43:36</div>		</div><!-- / Post -->	
						
		
								<div class="post-2327 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-system-diary tag-deep-web tag-eepsite tag-freebsd tag-hidden-service tag-i2p even" id="post-2327">
						<div class="post-headline"><h2>				<a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2014/11/15/%e5%9c%a8-freebsd-%e5%88%a9%e7%94%a8-i2p-%e6%9e%b6%e8%a8%ad-deep-web-site/" rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to 在 FreeBSD 利用 I2P 架設 deep web site">
				在 FreeBSD 利用 I2P 架設 deep web site</a></h2></div>				<div class="post-bodycopy clearfix"><p>I2P 也是一個老東西，不過這東西一直都沒有成熟過，到目前還屬於未完全開發的狀態，檯面上的社群也小得可憐。<br />
它比較少被人們注意，是因為它幾乎不被用來當作跳板，因為不像 Tor 一樣有一大堆 exit nodes，它主打的就是 I2P 網路內部的服務。<br />
I2P 網路內部提供的服務非常多樣性，mail、IRC、instant messaging 等服務都有，甚至可以用 BitTorrent 和 ed2k 等方式進行 file sharing。<br />
但是這網路的缺點就是慢，加上使用的人少，導致貢獻頻寬的人少，讓這網路可說是慢上加慢，但隱密性確實是強過 Tor 的。</p>
<p> <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2014/11/15/%e5%9c%a8-freebsd-%e5%88%a9%e7%94%a8-i2p-%e6%9e%b6%e8%a8%ad-deep-web-site/#more-2327" class="more-link">Continue reading 在 FreeBSD 利用 I2P 架設 deep web site »</a></p>
</div>						<div class="post-footer"><img src="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/wp-content/themes/atahualpa/images/icons/comment-gray.gif" alt="" /> <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2014/11/15/%e5%9c%a8-freebsd-%e5%88%a9%e7%94%a8-i2p-%e6%9e%b6%e8%a8%ad-deep-web-site/#respond" class="comments-link" ><span class="dsq-postid" data-dsqidentifier="2327 http://blog.tinlans.org/?p=2327">Leave a comment</span></a>   <img src="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/wp-content/themes/atahualpa/images/icons/folder-gray.gif" alt="" /> <a class="system-diary" href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/category/system-diary/" title="system diary">system diary</a>   <img src="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/wp-content/themes/atahualpa/images/icons/tag-gray.gif" alt="" /> <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/tag/deep-web/" rel="tag">deep web</a>, <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/tag/eepsite/" rel="tag">eepsite</a>, <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/tag/freebsd/" rel="tag">FreeBSD</a>, <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/tag/hidden-service/" rel="tag">hidden service</a>, <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/tag/i2p/" rel="tag">i2p</a>      | 2014-11-15 06:25:53</div>		</div><!-- / Post -->	
						
		
								<div class="post-2310 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-system-diary tag-deep-web tag-freebsd tag-hidden-service tag-tor odd" id="post-2310">
						<div class="post-headline"><h2>				<a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2014/11/15/%e5%9c%a8-freebsd-%e5%88%a9%e7%94%a8-tor-%e6%9e%b6%e8%a8%ad-deep-web-site/" rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to 在 FreeBSD 利用 Tor 架設 deep web site">
				在 FreeBSD 利用 Tor 架設 deep web site</a></h2></div>				<div class="post-bodycopy clearfix"><p>Tor 這玩意已經是老東西了，有些人只是把它當成跳板用，有些人會拿來瀏覽 .onion 虛擬網域下的 deep web sites，當然也有人拿來架 deep web sites。<br />
長年來人們對 deep web 都會有一些不切實際的傳說，譬如下面這幾張圖：<br />
<a href="/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/deep-web.jpg" rel="lightbox[2310]"><img src="/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/deep-web-300x191.jpg" alt="deep-web" width="300" height="191" class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-2312" /></a> <a href="/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/deep-web-247933.jpg" rel="lightbox[2310]"><img src="/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/deep-web-247933-300x205.jpg" alt="deep-web-247933" width="300" height="205" class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-2313" /></a> <a href="/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/150279_original.png" rel="lightbox[2310]"><img src="/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/150279_original-100x300.png" alt="150279_original" width="100" height="300" class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-2311" /></a><br />
這些圖片和傳說雖然有些是真的，但大部分都可以把它當成 joke 看待，不用對它們太認真。<br />
特別是第三張圖，你還會看到各種惡搞變形版，我只能說對它認真你就輸了。<br />
所以拜託不要再跑來問我什麼 Marianas Web 在哪，這些都是 bullshit，去問你地理老師還比較實在。<br />
至於用冰山來形容海面下有多少東西這種描述方式，我只能說以種類的數量來說的確如此，但以純粹的檔案容量來講這簡直胡扯。</p>
<p> <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2014/11/15/%e5%9c%a8-freebsd-%e5%88%a9%e7%94%a8-tor-%e6%9e%b6%e8%a8%ad-deep-web-site/#more-2310" class="more-link">Continue reading 在 FreeBSD 利用 Tor 架設 deep web site »</a></p>
</div>						<div class="post-footer"><img src="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/wp-content/themes/atahualpa/images/icons/comment-gray.gif" alt="" /> <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2014/11/15/%e5%9c%a8-freebsd-%e5%88%a9%e7%94%a8-tor-%e6%9e%b6%e8%a8%ad-deep-web-site/#respond" class="comments-link" ><span class="dsq-postid" data-dsqidentifier="2310 http://blog.tinlans.org/?p=2310">Leave a comment</span></a>   <img src="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/wp-content/themes/atahualpa/images/icons/folder-gray.gif" alt="" /> <a class="system-diary" href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/category/system-diary/" title="system diary">system diary</a>   <img src="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/wp-content/themes/atahualpa/images/icons/tag-gray.gif" alt="" /> <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/tag/deep-web/" rel="tag">deep web</a>, <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/tag/freebsd/" rel="tag">FreeBSD</a>, <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/tag/hidden-service/" rel="tag">hidden service</a>, <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/tag/tor/" rel="tag">tor</a>      | 2014-11-15 01:48:39</div>		</div><!-- / Post -->	
						
		
								<div class="post-2298 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-system-diary tag-3ware tag-raid even" id="post-2298">
						<div class="post-headline"><h2>				<a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2014/11/14/%e6%8f%9b%e4%b8%8b%e4%ba%86%e4%b8%80%e9%a1%86%e5%a3%9e%e8%bb%8c%e7%9a%84-wd2002faex/" rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to 換下了一顆壞軌的 WD2002FAEX">
				換下了一顆壞軌的 WD2002FAEX</a></h2></div>				<div class="post-bodycopy clearfix"><p>在 11/10 的時候收到通知，說這台主機的 RAID 進入了 degraded 狀態。<br />
進了 RAID 卡的 web UI 看了一下果然如此：<br />
<a href="/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/degraded-raid.png" rel="lightbox[2298]"><img src="/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/degraded-raid.png" alt="degraded-raid" width="795" height="504" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2299" /></a></p>
<p> <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2014/11/14/%e6%8f%9b%e4%b8%8b%e4%ba%86%e4%b8%80%e9%a1%86%e5%a3%9e%e8%bb%8c%e7%9a%84-wd2002faex/#more-2298" class="more-link">Continue reading 換下了一顆壞軌的 WD2002FAEX »</a></p>
</div>						<div class="post-footer"><img src="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/wp-content/themes/atahualpa/images/icons/comment-gray.gif" alt="" /> <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2014/11/14/%e6%8f%9b%e4%b8%8b%e4%ba%86%e4%b8%80%e9%a1%86%e5%a3%9e%e8%bb%8c%e7%9a%84-wd2002faex/#comments" class="comments-link" ><span class="dsq-postid" data-dsqidentifier="2298 http://blog.tinlans.org/?p=2298">1 comment</span></a>   <img src="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/wp-content/themes/atahualpa/images/icons/folder-gray.gif" alt="" /> <a class="system-diary" href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/category/system-diary/" title="system diary">system diary</a>   <img src="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/wp-content/themes/atahualpa/images/icons/tag-gray.gif" alt="" /> <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/tag/3ware/" rel="tag">3ware</a>, <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/tag/raid/" rel="tag">RAID</a>      | 2014-11-14 23:58:33</div>		</div><!-- / Post -->	
						
		
								<div class="post-2212 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-system-diary tag-eepsite tag-freebsd tag-i2p tag-tor odd" id="post-2212">
						<div class="post-headline"><h2>				<a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2014/11/08/%e5%9c%a8-freebsd-9-x-%e7%9a%84%e7%b3%bb%e7%b5%b1%e4%b8%ad%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%9d-i2p/" rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to 在 FreeBSD 9.x 的系統中安裝 i2p">
				在 FreeBSD 9.x 的系統中安裝 i2p</a></h2></div>				<div class="post-bodycopy clearfix"><p>可能是這東西不太流行，所以 ports maintainer 也沒太認真去維護它。<br />
所以這篇雖然是廢文，但也沒廢到只是叫你 cd /usr/ports/security/i2p 然後打個 make install clean 就收工了。<br />
因為陸續開始有一些講中文的在問，只好稍微簡單寫一下。</p>
<p> <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2014/11/08/%e5%9c%a8-freebsd-9-x-%e7%9a%84%e7%b3%bb%e7%b5%b1%e4%b8%ad%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%9d-i2p/#more-2212" class="more-link">Continue reading 在 FreeBSD 9.x 的系統中安裝 i2p »</a></p>
</div>						<div class="post-footer"><img src="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/wp-content/themes/atahualpa/images/icons/comment-gray.gif" alt="" /> <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2014/11/08/%e5%9c%a8-freebsd-9-x-%e7%9a%84%e7%b3%bb%e7%b5%b1%e4%b8%ad%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%9d-i2p/#comments" class="comments-link" ><span class="dsq-postid" data-dsqidentifier="2212 http://blog.tinlans.org/?p=2212">1 comment</span></a>   <img src="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/wp-content/themes/atahualpa/images/icons/folder-gray.gif" alt="" /> <a class="system-diary" href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/category/system-diary/" title="system diary">system diary</a>   <img src="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/wp-content/themes/atahualpa/images/icons/tag-gray.gif" alt="" /> <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/tag/eepsite/" rel="tag">eepsite</a>, <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/tag/freebsd/" rel="tag">FreeBSD</a>, <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/tag/i2p/" rel="tag">i2p</a>, <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/tag/tor/" rel="tag">tor</a>      | 2014-11-08 08:22:56</div>		</div><!-- / Post -->	
						
		
								<div class="post-2180 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-system-diary even" id="post-2180">
						<div class="post-headline"><h2>				<a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2014/10/25/%e5%9c%a8-freebsd-9-x-%e7%9a%84%e7%b3%bb%e7%b5%b1%e4%b8%ad%e5%95%9f%e7%94%a8-c11-%e5%8f%8a-libc/" rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to 在 FreeBSD 9.x 的系統中啟用 C++11 及 libc++">
				在 FreeBSD 9.x 的系統中啟用 C++11 及 libc++</a></h2></div>				<div class="post-bodycopy clearfix"><p>看標題應該就知道是用 clang 了，至於目的，當然就是要在 FreeBSD 裡使用最完全最先進的 C++11 來寫程式，並且拋棄 GCC 及 libstdc++。<br />
如果系統中有任何函式庫混入了 libstdc++，導致最終執行檔同時連結了 libc++ 及 libstdc++ (使用 ldd 檢查就能看見)，那麼程式在啟動時就會 crash。<br />
因此要達到這個目標，就必須自行編譯整個系統及所有套件，並確實讓使用到 C++ 的程式及函式庫都只連結到 libc++。</p>
<p> <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2014/10/25/%e5%9c%a8-freebsd-9-x-%e7%9a%84%e7%b3%bb%e7%b5%b1%e4%b8%ad%e5%95%9f%e7%94%a8-c11-%e5%8f%8a-libc/#more-2180" class="more-link">Continue reading 在 FreeBSD 9.x 的系統中啟用 C++11 及 libc++ »</a></p>
</div>						<div class="post-footer"><img src="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/wp-content/themes/atahualpa/images/icons/comment-gray.gif" alt="" /> <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2014/10/25/%e5%9c%a8-freebsd-9-x-%e7%9a%84%e7%b3%bb%e7%b5%b1%e4%b8%ad%e5%95%9f%e7%94%a8-c11-%e5%8f%8a-libc/#comments" class="comments-link" ><span class="dsq-postid" data-dsqidentifier="2180 http://blog.tinlans.org/?p=2180">1 comment</span></a>   <img src="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/wp-content/themes/atahualpa/images/icons/folder-gray.gif" alt="" /> <a class="system-diary" href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/category/system-diary/" title="system diary">system diary</a>    | 2014-10-25 04:21:35</div>		</div><!-- / Post -->	
						
		
								<div class="post-2170 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-system-diary tag-gentoo tag-gpt tag-uefi odd" id="post-2170">
						<div class="post-headline"><h2>				<a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2013/11/17/%e8%ae%93-gentoo-%e8%83%bd%e5%9c%a8-uefi-%e6%a8%a1%e5%bc%8f%e4%b8%8b%e9%96%8b%e6%a9%9f/" rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to 讓 Gentoo 能在 UEFI 模式下開機">
				讓 Gentoo 能在 UEFI 模式下開機</a></h2></div>				<div class="post-bodycopy clearfix"><p>公司新買的便宜 server 是 Acer 的 Altos T110 F3，這家的 BIOS 很奇怪，用 legacy mode 開機是抓不到任何 SATA 硬碟的，所以傳統的 MBR 模式也行不通。<br />
因為被迫使用 UEFI boot，所以這次只能乖乖學了，參考的文件是這篇：<a href="http://wiki.gentoo.org/wiki/UEFI_Gentoo_Quick_Install_Guide">UEFI Gentoo Quick Install Guide</a>。</p>
<p> <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2013/11/17/%e8%ae%93-gentoo-%e8%83%bd%e5%9c%a8-uefi-%e6%a8%a1%e5%bc%8f%e4%b8%8b%e9%96%8b%e6%a9%9f/#more-2170" class="more-link">Continue reading 讓 Gentoo 能在 UEFI 模式下開機 »</a></p>
</div>						<div class="post-footer"><img src="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/wp-content/themes/atahualpa/images/icons/comment-gray.gif" alt="" /> <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2013/11/17/%e8%ae%93-gentoo-%e8%83%bd%e5%9c%a8-uefi-%e6%a8%a1%e5%bc%8f%e4%b8%8b%e9%96%8b%e6%a9%9f/#comments" class="comments-link" ><span class="dsq-postid" data-dsqidentifier="2170 http://blog.tinlans.org/?p=2170">1 comment</span></a>   <img src="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/wp-content/themes/atahualpa/images/icons/folder-gray.gif" alt="" /> <a class="system-diary" href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/category/system-diary/" title="system diary">system diary</a>   <img src="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/wp-content/themes/atahualpa/images/icons/tag-gray.gif" alt="" /> <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/tag/gentoo/" rel="tag">Gentoo</a>, <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/tag/gpt/" rel="tag">GPT</a>, <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/tag/uefi/" rel="tag">UEFI</a>      | 2013-11-17 23:13:00</div>		</div><!-- / Post -->	
						
		
								<div class="post-2166 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-ldap-system-diary tag-ldap tag-samba even" id="post-2166">
						<div class="post-headline"><h2>				<a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2013/11/17/ldap-samba/" rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to LDAP + samba">
				LDAP + samba</a></h2></div>				<div class="post-bodycopy clearfix"><p>時隔五年之久，既<a href="/2008/11/26/%e5%af%a6%e9%a9%97%e4%ba%86-ldap/">實驗了一下 LDAP 的設定</a>這篇之後，又再度遇上了 LDAP 的設定問題。<br />
當年照那篇文章設定的話，在多台 samba servers 的環境下其實是會撞上一些問題的，也就是帳號認證會失敗。<br />
在問題發生的機器上輸入 pdbedit -L 的話，則會看到「sid S-1-5-21-3723331297-2499002124-1306837190-1001 does not belong to our domain」這樣的訊息。<br />
處理的方式很簡單，因為每台 server 的 smb.conf 都是 standalone server，採取「security = user」的設定，所以把 local SID 設成一樣就可以了。<br />
譬如在建立那個 samba 帳號的原機器輸入「net getlocalsid」的話，會看到「SID for domain <hostname> is: S-1-5-21-2347759184-1676931091-2532609757」。<br />
所以只要在每台機器都下「net setlocalsid S-1-5-21-2347759184-1676931091-2532609757」，這個問題就會解決。<br />
但是到了現在，這招已經不管用了。net setlocalsid 怎麼下都還是沒有作用，SID 死都不會變，所以需要學點新方法。</p>
<p> <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2013/11/17/ldap-samba/#more-2166" class="more-link">Continue reading LDAP + samba »</a></p>
</div>						<div class="post-footer"><img src="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/wp-content/themes/atahualpa/images/icons/comment-gray.gif" alt="" /> <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/2013/11/17/ldap-samba/#respond" class="comments-link" ><span class="dsq-postid" data-dsqidentifier="2166 http://blog.tinlans.org/?p=2166">Leave a comment</span></a>   <img src="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/wp-content/themes/atahualpa/images/icons/folder-gray.gif" alt="" /> <a class="ldap-system-diary" href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/category/system-diary/ldap-system-diary/" title="LDAP">LDAP</a>   <img src="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/wp-content/themes/atahualpa/images/icons/tag-gray.gif" alt="" /> <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/tag/ldap/" rel="tag">LDAP</a>, <a href="http://t7xcpwokiagivyzq.onion/tag/samba/" rel="tag">samba</a>      | 2013-11-17 22:27:28</div>		</div><!-- / Post -->
